contents.Text: [[[underline:Soft Purple]]] ≈ Select Directory
[[[underline:Soft Yellow]]] ≈ Select values
[[[underline:Dark Blue]]] ≈ Input replacement value
[[[underline:Light Green]]] ≈ Save/Discard
[[[underline:Pale Orange]]] ≈ Confirm/View changes
[[[underline:Soft Peach]]] ≈ Search Folder
[[[underline:Deep Green]]] ≈ Search Song Names
[[[underline:Cyan Blue]]] ≈ Show Mode & Stats
[[[underline:Crimson Red]]] ≈ Toggle Multi-Table Mode
[[[underline:Deep Purple]]] ≈ Columns Toggles
[[[strong:Left-click]]] to select a directory to edit.
[[[strong:Right-click]]] to queue the directory for regeneration. This action removes the directory from the database and re-imports it fresh.
Select columns or cells to edit.
[[[strong:Tip]]]: Hold [[[strong:SHIFT + LEFT-CLICK]]] on a cell, then scroll down in the same column and hold [[[strong:SHIFT + LEFT-CLICK]]] again to select all cells in between.

[[[strong:Tip2]]]: Hold [[[strong:CTRL + SHIFT + LEFT-CLICK]]] on a cell, then scroll down in the same column and hold [[[strong:CTRL + SHIFT + LEFT-CLICK]]] again to select all cells that match the first cell's value.
[[[strong:• Four-letter code]]] - requires a standardised four-character code (example: "2015").
[[[strong:• Integer only]]] - accepts only whole numbers.
[[[strong:• Read-only]]] - cannot be modified by users.
[[[strong:• name]]] - The title or name of the audio file ([[[warning:read-only]]]).
[[[strong:• ext]]] - The file extension (e.g., MP3, WAV, FLAC) ([[[warning:read-only]]]).
[[[strong:• played]]] - Tracks if the file has been played ([[[warning:read-only]]]).
[[[strong:• length]]] - Duration of the audio file ([[[warning:read-only]]]).
[[[strong:• sample_rate]]] - Sample rate of the audio file ([[[warning:read-only]]]).
[[[strong:• channel_count]]] - Channel count of the audio file ([[[warning:read-only]]]).
[[[strong:• bitrate]]] - Bitrate of the audio file ([[[warning:read-only]]]).
[[[strong:• modification_date]]] - Date the file was last modified (Used for automatically detecting files that have updated using a external program) ([[[warning:read-only]]]).
[[[strong:• cached_fingerprint]]] - This is a cache fingerprint to help speed up deduplicate detection (This is cache-on-demand so it is only calculated when needed) ([[[warning:read-only]]]).
[[[strong:• artist]]] - The performing artist or creator.
[[[strong:• album]]] - This field is used to store the title of the album that the track belongs to.

[[[strong:• album_artist]]] - This tag indicates the primary artist or group responsible for the album. In cases where an album features multiple artists, the album artist may differ from the individual track artists.
[[[strong:• artists]]] - This tag lists all the artists involved in the creation of the track. It can include the main artist, featured artists, and any other contributors.
[[[strong:• genre]]] - The musical or content genre.
[[[strong:• language]]] - The language of the audio content.
[[[strong:• lyrics]]] - Contains song lyrics if available.
[[[strong:• year]]] - The release or recording year/date ([[[warning:integer only]]]).
[[[strong:• country]]] - Country of origin ([[[warning:four-letter code]]],[[[warning:integer only]]]).
[[[strong:• label]]] - The publishing or record label.
[[[strong:• release_type]]] - Type of release (e.g., album, single, EP).
[[[strong:• tags]]] - Custom user-defined tags.
[[[strong:• ratings]]] - Personal user or community rating ([[[warning:integer only]]]).
[[[strong:• metadata_comments]]] - Comments included in the file's metadata.
[[[strong:• user_notes]]] - Personal notes added by the user.
Once cells are selected, type the value you want to replace it with in the text box.
Press Enter to confirm and add the values to the Save/Discard.
Tip: You can drag the "Input replacement value" up to display fewer buttons, thus improving performance.
Save changes: Press the button to commit all changes in "Confirm/View changes".
Discard all changes: Press the button to discard all changes in "Confirm/View changes".
This section is a little more complex see [[[button:Confirm/View changes][View Changes]]] for more information.
[[[warning:NOTE]]]: This will also apon completion of processing it will potentially display a list of any songs that failed to be processed.
Search the [[[strong:Select Directory]]] for a specific folder.
[[[warning:NOTE]]]: This is a simple search matching any characters in sequence.
Search the [[[strong:Select values]]] songs column for a specific song.
[[[warning:NOTE]]]: This is a simple search matching any characters in sequence.
This will only search the currently selected table from the [[[strong:Select Directory]]]
Shows the current [[[strong:Shuffle Mode]]] and the [[[strong:Stats]]] of the selected table.
[[[warning:NOTE]]]: This is changes while in multi-table mode see [[[button:Multi Table Mode][Multi Table Mode]]] for more information.
Toggles Multi-Table Mode which allows you to select multiple tables and combine them together in the [[[strong:Select values]]]
See [[[button:Multi Table Mode][Multi Table Mode]]] for more information.
Click to show what columns are shown or hidden
Click on any column to toggle it on or off
